title.value: Guidelines for the computational testing of machine learning approaches to vehicle routing problems
title.justification: The title reflects the focus of the paper on providing guidelines for computational testing of ML approaches to VRPs.
title.quote: Guidelines for the computational testing of machine learning approaches to vehicle routing problems

extractions.description: The paper discusses challenges in the computational evaluation of machine learning techniques applied to vehicle routing problems and proposes guidelines to align testing methodologies between the ML and OR communities.

type.justification: The paper focuses on computational evaluation and testing of machine learning approaches, which involves empirical methods.
type.quote: The current work focuses on this second aspect by highlighting important points to consider during the computational testing and providing guidelines and methodologies.

name.justification: The paper's main focus is on vehicle routing problems as indicated by the frequent mention and discussion of VRPs.
name.quote: we highlight a number of challenges arising during the computational evaluation of heuristics for VRPs.

name.justification: The paper addresses ML approaches to problems, indicating its relevance as a sub-field.
name.quote: the extensive research efforts and the promising results obtained by the ML community on Vehicle Routing Problems

name.justification: The paper explores ML applications to combinatorial optimization problems, including VRPs.
name.quote: attempts to use machine learning (ML) to deal with combinatorial optimization problems (COPs).

name.justification: Pointer Networks are mentioned as a novel neural network architecture used for VRPs.
name.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures such as pointer networks [36]

is_contributed.justification: The paper does not claim to contribute Pointer Networks as a new model.
is_contributed.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures such as pointer networks [36]

is_executed.justification: There is no evidence that Pointer Networks were executed in the study.
is_executed.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures such as pointer networks [36]

is_compared.justification: There is no comparison of Pointer Networks with other models in the paper.
is_compared.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures such as pointer networks [36]

referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper title on Pointer Networks is consistent with naming conventions.
referenced_paper_title.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures such as pointer networks [36]

name.justification: Graph Embedding Networks are mentioned as one of the architectures achieving impressive results for VRPs.
name.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures...graph embedding networks [11,19]

is_contributed.justification: The paper does not introduce Graph Embedding Networks as a new model.
is_contributed.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures...graph embedding networks [11,19]

is_executed.justification: The paper does not provide evidence of execution of this model.
is_executed.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures...graph embedding networks [11,19]

is_compared.justification: No numerical comparison involving Graph Embedding Networks is presented.
is_compared.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures...graph embedding networks [11,19]

referenced_paper_title.value: Learning Combinatorial Optimization Algorithms over Graphs
referenced_paper_title.justification: This seems to be the likely referenced paper for Graph Embedding Networks given the context and citation.
referenced_paper_title.quote: VRPs have been the test-bed for novel neural network architectures...graph embedding networks [11,19]

name.justification: Attention-based models are noted for their success in solving VRPs.
name.quote: attention-based models [20,12] achieving stunning results on a variety of problems.

is_contributed.justification: The paper does not claim to contribute Attention-based Models.
is_contributed.quote: attention-based models [20,12] achieving stunning results on a variety of problems.

is_executed.justification: No execution details of Attention-based Models are given in the paper.
is_executed.quote: attention-based models [20,12] achieving stunning results on a variety of problems.

is_compared.justification: There is no comparison provided for Attention-based Models.

referenced_paper_title.value: Attention, Learn to Solve Routing Problems!
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper likely discusses Attention-based Models for routing problems.
